Now, the full Fortran code:

program main

  implicit none

  real(8) :: input, countOdd, value, scaled, rounded_value
  character(len=12) :: str
  character :: char

  ! Read input
  read(*,*) input

  ! Check for division by zero
  if (input == 0.0d0) then
     write(*,*) "Error: Division by zero"
     stop
  end if

  ! Compute countOdd
  countOdd = nint(input / 2.0d0)

  ! Compute value
  value = countOdd / input

  ! Round to 10 decimal places using scaling
  scaled = value * 10.0d0**10
  rounded_scaled = nint(scaled)
  rounded_value = rounded_scaled / 10.0d0**10

  ! Format to string with 10 decimals
  write(str, '(F12.10)') rounded_value

  ! Find last non-space/non-? character (since there are none, it's last character)
  char = str(12:12)

  ! Convert to lowercase (though it's a digit, but just in case)
  char = achar(ichar(char) + 32)

  ! Check if vowel
  if (char == 'a' .or. char == 'e' .or. char == 'i' .or. char == 'o' .or. char == 'u' .or. char == 'y') then
     write(*,*) 'YES'
  else
     write(*,*) 'NO'
  end if

end program main

  ! Format to string with 10 decimals

  char = str(12:12)

  ! Convert to lowercase (though it's a digit, but just in case)
  char = achar(ichar(char) + 32)

  if (char == 'a' .or. char == 'e' .or. char == 'i' .or. char == 'o' .or. char == 'u' .or. char == 'y') then
     write(*,*) 'YES'
  else
     write(*,*) 'NO'
  end if

end program main
